languages.text: "Если ты оставишь меня в покое в обмен на Иремерисс — так и быть, она твоя".
"Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."
languages.original_text: "Если ты оставишь меня в покое в обмен на Иремерисс — так и быть, она твоя".

traits.locale_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."
"Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."
"Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."
"Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

languages.text: “如果你想杀伊芮梅莉斯，就别再来烦我。我可以把她留给你。”
languages.original_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

traits.locale_text: “如果你想杀伊芮梅莉斯，就别再来烦我。我可以把她留给你。”

languages.text: 「イレメリスと引き換えに、こちらのことは放っておいてくれ。彼女はお前に渡す」
languages.original_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

traits.locale_text: 「イレメリスと引き換えに、こちらのことは放っておいてくれ。彼女はお前に渡す」

languages.text: «Déjame en paz a cambio de Yremeryss, y será toda tuya».
languages.original_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

traits.locale_text: «Déjame en paz a cambio de Yremeryss, y será toda tuya».

languages.text: « Laissez-moi tranquille, et je vous laisse Yremeryss. »
languages.original_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi tranquille, et je vous laisse Yremeryss. »

languages.text: "Lasst mich in Ruhe und Ihr bekommt im Austausch dafür Yremeryss."
languages.original_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst mich in Ruhe und Ihr bekommt im Austasch dafür Yremeryss."

languages.text: "Yremeryss'e karşılık beni rahat bırakırsan onu alabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Leave me alone in exchange for Yremeryss, and you can have her."

traits.locale_text: "Yremeryss karşılığında beni rahat bırakırsan onu alabilirsin."
